definition: US National Aeronautics and Space Administration/NASA
US National Aeronautics and Space Administration/NASA/abbr. for 美國宇航局|美国宇航局

sentences.english: My house is only a few miles from Spaceport.
sentences.chinese: 我的家离宇航中心只有几里路。

sentences.english: The fighter also carried an astromech droid for onboard repairs.
sentences.chinese: 战斗机上也有宇航技工机器人负责机载维修。

sentences.english: Musk’s rockets are ultimately intended to carry cargo and crew to the space station.
sentences.chinese: 马斯科的火箭最终计划为空间站输送货物和宇航员。

sentences.english: The name of the Russian astronaut who performed this feat was Leonov.
sentences.chinese: 建立这一功绩的苏联宇航员名叫雷诺夫。

sentences.english: The astronaut was welcomed with joyous,resounding acclaim.
sentences.chinese: 人们欢声雷动地迎接那位宇航员。
大概我将成为一位宇航员。

sentences.english: I like it very much because I want to be an astronaut in the future.
sentences.chinese: 我非常喜欢它，因为我想将来当一名宇航员。

sentences.english: So why become an astronaut at all?
sentences.chinese: 那么，为什么要成为一名宇航员呢？

sentences.english: Two astronauts spent six and a half hours unhooking a girder from the International Space Station.
sentences.chinese: 两名宇航员花了六个半小时解开国际空间站上地钢架。

sentences.english: More than 43,000 application requests received by NASA.
sentences.chinese: 国家宇航局收到了四万三千多份申请。

sentences.english: Photos related with the space taken by the astronauts.
sentences.chinese: 以下均是由宇航员拍摄的与太空有关的照片。

sentences.english: The astronauts' urine, incidentally, is recycled into clean water.
sentences.chinese: 顺便一提，宇航员的尿液会循环成清水。

sentences.english: Have you ever wanted to be an astronaut?
sentences.chinese: 你曾想成为一个宇航员吗？

sentences.english: He returned to Eagle and removed his helmet in the repressurized cabin .
sentences.chinese: 他回到鹰号在增压舱摘除宇航帽。

sentences.english: The two space vehicles docked in space and exchanged astronauts.
sentences.chinese: 两个宇宙飞行器在外层空间对接并交换宇航员。

sentences.english: "Feeling pretty good, " Fei said in the first broadcast comment from the astronauts.
sentences.chinese: “感觉相当好，”宇航员费在首次通讯中说。
